name: Fairytale Slots Queen Free Play Slot Machine
name_original: Fairytale Slots Queen Free Play Slot Machine
description:
Love to play slots? Experience the magical pixie dust luck and win big in this fun and amazing slots machine game!

The Fairytale Blossom Slots is a completely free and addictive slots machine game for your iPhone, iPad, and iPod device.

Main Features:
>Free credits every few hours
>Hit it Rich Lucky bonus games
>Awesome graphics
>Fun like Vegas
>Endless Slot-o-mania entertainment!

Try out this fun and addictive slot machine game without losing any money! This game will keep you playing for hours!
publishers: Fortune Wheel of Slot Machine Games
